scripts.test:all: npm run test  && npm run test:e2e
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Skipping wxt prepare during build process'
scripts.clean:unused: npm run lint:unused && npm run lint:unused-vars
scripts.clean:all: npm run lint:fix && npm run clean:unused
scripts.find:unused: eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx | grep 'is defined but never used'
scripts.report:unused: echo 'Unused variables report:' && npm run find:unused || echo 'No unused variables found!'
scripts.depcheck:report: depcheck --json > depcheck-report.json && echo 'Depcheck report saved to depcheck-report.json'
scripts.unused:all: npm run knip:all && npm run tsr:check && npm run depcheck
scripts.unused:fix: npm run knip:fix; npm run tsr:write; npm run lint:fix
scripts.unused:remove-broken-tests: npm run compile 2>&1 | grep 'Cannot find module' | sed -n "s/.*\(tests\/[^(]*\).*/\1/p" | sort -u | xargs -I {} sh -c 'echo "Removing broken test: {}" && rm "{}"'
scripts.unused:complete: npm run unused:fix && npm run unused:remove-broken-tests && npm run compile
scripts.test-and-lint: npm run unused:complete && npm run test:all && npm run knip:all && echo 'recursive test passed and knip passed, so no unused code remains!' || (echo 'Either tests or knip found issues. Please address them.' && exit 1)
